plays.text: Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Allison
Penalty to Jere Karalahti 2 minutes for Boarding Krystofer Kolanos
Penalty to Mikko Eloranta 2 minutes for Interference Wyatt Smith
Penalty to Ken Belanger 2 minutes for Roughing Todd Simpson
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Shane Doan assisted by Daymond Langkow and Danny Markov
Penalty to Craig Johnson 2 minutes for Holding Michal Handzus
Goal scored by Jason Allison assisted by Lubomir Visnovsky and Jaroslav Modry
Penalty to Claude Lemieux 2 minutes for Holding Craig Johnson
